channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping of chair, 12th June
item.description:
Chair has been fly tipped and left behind shops and in front of houses on Rockells Place - left for around 5 days now

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Royal Oak Place, Nunhead, London

item.title: On Barker Driver, 12th June
item.description:
Resident called about the bollard at the end of Barker Drive. She has reported several times that people keep removing the bollard, and the access restriction is being abused.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barker Drive, Kentish Town, London

Been gradually getting worse oner the last year or so

item.title: Potholes Long Lane o/s Russell Park Bowls Club, 12th June
item.description:
Damaged kerb & Potholes - I was driving down long lane about 100yard away from the pub. I had to swerve to avoid accident and went down into pot hole and it has caused damage to car. - Also reported to Insurance & Risk Dept - AAC-001040
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Long Lane, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pelham Road / Woolwich Road Jct - Parking around bellmouth on Sunday, 12th June
item.description:
Parking around the bellmouth occurs on Sundays when an event is happening in the adjacent Bexleyheath Academy school. Cars park indiscriminately restricting the road to one lane - drivers then need to give way - on occasions to vehicles leaving Pelham Road creating a queue on Woolwich Road and a hazard or increasing the risk of a head on collision as vehicles move around the bellmouth. Please investigate restricting all parking in this location.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pelham Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Container of Fluid, 12th June
item.description:
I reported this on Sunday and it is still there! Your operatives have moved it between the reclying bins and left unsafe‼️ This could contain some hazardous liquid and should not be ignored.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Perry Street, Crayford, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Inconsiderate flytipping, 12th June
item.description:
This bed base has been dumped blocking the footpath

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): York Hill, West Norwood, London

item.title: Perimeter railing section missing - Hoblingwell Leesons Way, 12th June
item.description:
A section of the perimeter railing is missing opposite 55 Leesons Way. This was previously repaired. The poles forming the railing are not located centrally within the posts. Please could this be rectified?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 47, Leesons Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Garden waste - Hoblingwell, Leesons Way, 12th June
item.description:
There are multiple piles (at least 4 at time of writing) of garden- that have been fly-tipped at the woodland edges of Hoblingwell, located opposite 45 to Leesons Way. There are three piles near lamppost 14L11. Please could these be removed?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Leesons Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly-tipped waste - cul-de-sac of Ravenscourt Road, 12th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leesons Hill, St Paul's Cray, Orpington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road works on north end, 12th June
item.description:
The road works are limiting a large area of the limited parking available to residents. The road works are currently abandoned with no workmen on site. Attempts are not being made to minimise the ongoing disruption. This is a request to expedite the works allowing residents to park their vehicles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, North End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned fridge in road, 12th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Silverdale Road, St Paul's Cray, London
